name: Music Box (itch) (RustyRocket)
description:
A simple looking platform puzzler where the player navigates levels by creating clones to climb up to higher ground. 

Instructions:

Arrow keys to move.

Space to clone

R to reset the level

This is my entry to the Weekly Game Jam challenge titled Clones.
